{{ product.metafields.descriptors.subtitle.value }}

settings.title: All matte. No glare.
settings.text: A true matte full HD display with a protective coating allows colours to shine while diffusing ambient light.

settings.title: Massive Battery.
settings.text: Enjoy up to 14 hours of uninterrupted productivity, ensuring you can work throughout the day without interruption wherever you go.

settings.heading: Open-source firmware powered by coreboot and edk II

settings.text: We know that Linux users value open-source principles and robust security. That's why we've equipped the StarBook with coreboot firmware, an open-source alternative to traditional BIOS, offering advanced security features such as BIOS Lock, Secure Boot, and Measured Boot.

settings.title: Measured Boot
settings.text: Secured boot flow gives you peace of mind.

settings.title: 5-years of updates
settings.text: Backed by secure updates delivered via the LVFS.

settings.title: Lightweight Firmware
settings.text: Super efficient firmware that only takes 0.76s to POST.

Tailor your firmware effortlessly using the Advanced Configuration interface, a nod to the trusted feel of traditional BIOS.

From perfecting system performance to ensuring compatibility across diverse Operating Systems, the realm of endless tweaking awaits. Delve deep into the extensive options and mold your firmware to your unique specifications.

settings.title: WiFi 6E and Bluetooth 5.3
settings.text: For all things wireless

settings.title: USB-C
settings.text: With Thunderboltâ¢ 4 for charging and expansion*

settings.title: HDMI
settings.text: For easy output virtually everywhere

settings.title: USB-A
settings.text:
2 x Full-size USB 3.0

1 x Full-size USB 2.0

settings.title: Combo Jack
settings.text: For audio input and output

settings.title: Micro SD
settings.text: For importing from a camera and mobile data transfers

Backlit: comfortable backlit keys with snappy scissor mechanisms

Media Keys: for playback, volume, brightness, screenshots and more

Function Lock: switch between media and traditional function keys with one tap

International Layouts: US English, UK English, French, German, Nordic and Spanish layouts

Laptops designed for open-source software need open warranties. Our 1-year limited warranty allows you to take your computer apart, replace parts, install an upgrade, and use any operating system and even your firmware, all without voiding the warranty.

settings.title: TODO: Shipping
settings.text: Pair text with an image to focus on your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.

settings.title: 14 days to change your mind
settings.text: We do this for passion, and as such, we're confident you'll love our laptops as much as we do. If you don't, you have 14 days from the day you receive it to change your mind.

settings.title: Unparalleled support
settings.text: Our highly skilled support team based in the UK can assist with any support queries or general advice on getting the best out of Linux and our laptops.

settings.title: Assembled, imaged and programmed in the UK
settings.text: Configured by our own engineers, giving you peace of mind that you get what you want with no hidden extras.

settings.title: Custom-built to order
settings.text: Our laptops are highly customisable, which allows you to only pay for what you will use. You can choose from a host of options, ranging from the power cable to the firmware.

settings.title: Support the developers
settings.text: We work with the developers from some of the top Linux distributions to ensure the best experience. We donate a portion of our sales to help their projects go further.
